Mayor Mario Garza

### Mayor Mario Garza

### “We are Passionate About Taking Care of Our City”

To keep moving forward and elevate the well-being of our cherished residents, we must stand firm in our resolve to invest in enhancing our city’s infrastructure and services. This commitment isn’t just about laying bricks and expanding roads; it’s about fortifying the very foundation upon which our community thrives. By prioritizing these improvements, we pave the way for continued growth and ensure that every individual in our city experiences an improved quality of life. Let’s work together to shape a brighter future for all who call San Juan home.

![City of San Juan, Texas](https://www.sjtx.us/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/512png.png "512png")
